website_summaries.verdict: If the idea of wrestling a slipcover into place sounds daunting, this option might be just the thing for you. Plus, it's reversible, so you get two looks in one.
pros: Features 2" adjustable elastic strap to keep from sliding
Comes in black/black, black/gray, burgundy/tan, chocolate/beige, hunter green/sage, navy/sand, seafoam/cream, dog/chocolate and quatrefoil/mocha

customer_reviews.title: They will fit perfectly just measure your furniture, it’s super simple
customer_reviews.text: Thee Best by far furnisher products and you can’t beat the price. I really didn’t think that they would fit because my furniture is the puffy kind. Fits like a glove thats super comfortable! I love them! Thank you for making such a versatile product.
customer_reviews.author: L. Russell

customer_reviews.title: odd shape
customer_reviews.text: doesn't accurately fit my chair. I knew that buying it I just wanted a cover for my leather chair sticking against my skin. the tag designed to hold the strap to the chair broke almost instantly. made of very poor quality cloth and stitched terribly it ripped as soon as I snagged the strap trying to adjust it. All in all i had to restitch and fabricate the sheet myself to fit the chair. Should have just bought the cloth myself.
customer_reviews.author: Justin T. Varieur

customer_reviews.title: It sheds
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the extra large recliner cover. The size is good. The buckle too hold the Bach I place doesn’t work. It slips out within minutes. The inner padding that is quilted is super thin and fiber work out of the fabric. I don’t have a pet, but it looks like I do because of little fibers on it. They also stick to my clothes. It got worse after I washed it. I would never recommend anyone to buy it.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela

customer_reviews.title: Not made properly
customer_reviews.text: I really like this cover. I bought three different ones, oversized sofa, loveseat, and the recliner. Everyone but the recliner stays clipped and in place. The recliner clip falls off, strap comes off, etc. I think the loops to hold in place are not positioned properly. I wish I sent it back, but kept hoping things would get better. Right now there's no strap holding it because it doesn't go across and the metal piece just twists and falls off. Please correct this problem. This could be a good product
customer_reviews.author: MJ

customer_reviews.title: Finally a good chair cover
customer_reviews.text: This is the third recliner cover i have bought from amazon and by far the best. I hope you keep this one available. It was only a few dollars more but fit perfect and best of all the arms stayed in place and the back part that goes over the back of chair was long enough so you don’t have to constantly readjust. Strap in back held everything in place
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth ing

customer_reviews.title: Used for a recliner 3 seater sofa
customer_reviews.text: I bought 3 of these to use for our 3 recliner sofa. We are potty training our kids and we bought this new sofa. We need a waterproof cover to protect but also be comfortable on a daily basis. I tucked the arm rest covers in the middle spaces between each recliner. It works and looks decent. A plus is it looks good on top with the exception of the strap belt. Perhaps if the backing had elastic to hold over the top part of the recliner it would look better. Other than that, I’m pretty happy with this product. I have yet to test the waterproof part.
customer_reviews.author: Hana Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Quality A+++
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for my mother-in-law’s power lift recliner. It fit perfectly! Looks great too! I just washed it for the first time and it came out beautifully! Liked it so well, we just bought another one to have on hand. Which was perfect timing because the same day we received it, MIL spilled her ensure. Hubby was able to easily change the cover, while I helped change his mother’s shirt. All is well. And she didn’t even notice! Great quality product!
customer_reviews.author: R. Alexander

customer_reviews.title: Fit and look great!
customer_reviews.text: I bought the sofa and large recliner protectors in blue. We love them. They fit perfectly and look good too. They do need straightening after an evening’s use but it is done quickly—just smooth it out again and retuck the ends. Some reviews complained about this but you must remember—these are COVERS not a new upholstering job (I did upholstering years ago). I only gave four stars for durability because I have only used them less than a week but with normal care, they look like they will hold up. To top it off—they came w/i a week of ordering! Thanks AMAZON!
customer_reviews.author: LFergie

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: This product does not stay in place at all. Even when I go to sit in the chair, the back moves or falls down so don't even get me started with when the kids set in it. I would show you how it has now become a pile in the chair if I was there to take a photo. The strap does not stay connected and slides inside the chair. The fabric slides right out of the buckles that are supposed to hold the strap. What a waste of money!!!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Schroeder

customer_reviews.title: Very nice.
customer_reviews.text: They are far better than I had expected. The picture is after 24 hours of two dogs wallowing around on it with no more tucks. They Like to bro underneath them. I like the way the strap fastens across the back and hold them up. It will just take a quick tuck this morning and it’s good for another 24 hours. The color is just as I wanted and expected. I don’t know about how it washes or stain release as I’ve only had them on for two days. I do wish, that they were waterproof. It’s not the dogs that make wet messes, it’s the adults that spell their drinks.
customer_reviews.author: lds

customer_reviews.title: no pet, lots of house guests...
customer_reviews.text: I have a handicapped person in the house and a lot of people sit on our furniture. bought this to keep them clean, also keep dust off. I can't account for pets. spills I'm sure will happen sooner or later. okay, the bad is there is white lint on the cover you have to brush off - okay. the part of the design where they meshed the sides together reflects light. so, dark color refects spots when the light hits the fused section. this looks like white lint is on the cover. this is fine, but depending light in the room it may bother you. take notice. Since I don't care about the look so much - okay.
customer_reviews.author: diydiy

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Just an observation, these run a little on the big side, but nonetheless, this is a very good over sized recliner cover... I bought this oversized powerlifter recliner, because I've just gone thru Emergency abdominal surgery, and this chair, I can sleep in, relax in, and of course take occasional meals while in this chair and that is the very reason I bought this water resistant and easy to clean, recliner cover... and the chocolate color is exactly the perfect shade of chocolate, so perfect, it's hard to see where the cover meets the fabric of my recliner.
customer_reviews.author: Jan

customer_reviews.title: Don’t recommend for a large dog
customer_reviews.text: This product is not intended for a large dog. It will not stay in place! I come home from work and it’s wadded up in the corners and he’s laying directly on the furniture. It was a waste of money - I’ve covered the recliner with a blanket and it stays in place better!
customer_reviews.author: Tldavis

customer_reviews.title: Does not stay in place
customer_reviews.text: Although this shield was well made, soft to the touch and sized perfectly, it does not work on a recliner/lift chair that is constantly changing positions. We bought it for my elderly mother, but the seat and armrests would rumple up every time she changed her position. The strap does a great job of keeping the back in place, but unfortunately the other half of the chair covering would not stay put.
customer_reviews.author: Louiegirl

customer_reviews.title: Truly excellent
customer_reviews.text: I have two old but much beloved armchairs and I wanted to spare the linen upholstery from frequent washing. I was able to find an almost perfect color to blend in with my original covers. Although they are not recliners, I did some careful measuring before ordering and the big recliner size was clearly the closest in size to my chairs The covers fit extraordinarily well, and already resisted at least one accidental spill. . I have not yet had to wash them. It seems particularly easy to remove pet hair. I am very happy with the quality and price and would definitely recommend this cover to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: AmisTop Contributor: Knitting

customer_reviews.title: Perfect, just what we were looking for
customer_reviews.text: We purchased a sofa with a recliner on each end. These are perfect covers. They fit really well although we decided not to use the elastic bands as they're not needed. We use one arm cover and lay the other arm cover over the middle of the sofa as it only has one arm per recliner. They are great! Yes they move since we're only laying them on the sofa, but they are soft and very well made. They are protecting our investment and no doubt will last a long time. Great purchase and highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Ron

customer_reviews.title: Loving it!  The recliner cover works great for reclining sofas!!
customer_reviews.text: Fabric is soft, has nice quilted feel. Have New Power recline sofa & loveseat with moving headrests. Couch center folds down in middle. Bought 5 of the recliner covers to protect from dog, covered each couch seat with its own cover. Folded extra arm fabric under. Its a tight fit, but everything moves freely. To access the Center part that folds down we strapped around fold out arm and just drape fabric over back of couch when closed. Doing this worked way better than I ever thought it would!
customer_reviews.author: Psycomom1

customer_reviews.title: I love this cover!
customer_reviews.text: I got a futon and a recliner cover from this company. I love the strap in the back to keep it in place. With 4 yorkies, I needed something that would stay in place with them running on and off the furniture, LOL. So far, so good. It also looks nice, not cheap like some others I looked at. I would definitely recommend these covers.
customer_reviews.author: James and Beth

customer_reviews.title: Pleased with our Purchase
customer_reviews.text: I just got my covers so I can’t tell you how durable they are yet. I will tell you that when I washed them right out of the box, they washed and dried nicely. I ordered 2 in grey and 2 in navy blue. The navy blue fit our larger recliners great (in our family room); the grey ones are a little bigger for our recliners on our glassed in porch, but with a little extra tucking they are working just fine. Both orders were delivered on time and packaged very well. So far we are pleased!
customer_reviews.author: smithgg

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Large La-Z-Boy Recliner/Lift Chair
customer_reviews.text: I have two large La-Z-Boy recliner lift chairs. I ordered one Sofa Shield Original Patent Pending Reversible Recliner Slipcover to see how it would fit. Perfect! I was concerned that it would be too small or not work with the motion of the lift chair. I was very pleased with overall size, quality of stitching, and ability to stay in place when operating the lift chair function. I highly recommend this product. Note: Since they are not waterproof, I treated them with Scotchgard Heavy Duty Water Repellent. I hung them over a shower rod to spray and allowed them to dry several days before placing on the chairs. My two large Dobermans recommend them, too.
customer_reviews.author: mikemon

customer_reviews.title: It fits my recliner
customer_reviews.text: It looks good right after I put it on, but if I sit, it moves so much on my electric recliner that every time I get up, I have to pull it back into place. It slides forward quite a bit. I bought this so I didn't have to throw a blanket over my new furniture however I'm doing just as much work pulling and adjusting every time I get up to keep the cats from throwing up or doing some other cat foolery on the new stuff. I don't know that next time I'd bother getting one of these.
customer_reviews.author: maelstromjammer

customer_reviews.title: "Very nice item"
customer_reviews.text: I bought this chair cover for my dad!!! It fit perfect plenty of room to stuff down inside chair arms. The price is reasonable. Im actually going to see what other colors are available. The fabric is not water proof but thats not why I bought it. He works outside alot so now his recliner will not get dirty and we can wash this cover. I would recommend this item and seller. I have washed it several times, washed and dried very well. The color matched perfect from site. It came on time. GREAT PRODUCT!!!! Very Pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn S.

customer_reviews.title: Stop the cat from scratching
customer_reviews.text: My purpose for buying this cover was to keep my new (and expensive) recliner from becoming my cat's new shredding post. So far it seems to be working. The cat still sits on the chair but the scratching has stopped. My one complaint is the plastic smell. I know most people using the cover take it off when sitting in the chair but that wouldn't solve the scratching post issues. I'm hoping the smell will dissipate after being out of the plastic bag for a while.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie S.

customer_reviews.title: Love these protectors
customer_reviews.text: We have 3 cats and 2 dogs that all like to sit on the furniture with us. I was tired of covering the pieces with towels and/or blankets so decided to look into pet furniture protectors. I decided to order these after having looked at lots of products and reading reviews. I couldn’t be happier with these. They seem to be well made, the straps fit well, they washed well without wrinkling and are very soft. Within 2 days one of the cats threw up on one of them during the night. It did not soak through to the chair fabric and I just threw the cover in the washer. Would buy again. Happy!
customer_reviews.author: ruth ann glover

customer_reviews.title: Poorly designed
customer_reviews.text: This recliner cover was absolutely awful! It wouldn’t stay on or in place for anything. It is poorly designed with no way to keep it in place with just one elastic strap with just two loops to hold the back in place. It needs four loops to keep the back in place. Don’t bother purchasing this one, I’m returning and will keep looking for a better designed cover.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Big Chair Cover
customer_reviews.text: Cover is big. It slides around and the elastic strap is stretched to the limit, but I still like this cover for protecting the chair. Why? Well, I patched a few holes in the chair where the black material wore off to threaded material and this cover will hopefully prolong the life of the chair. I may glue velcro strips under the arms of chair and chair protector to make it keep its' shape better and not not slide around.
customer_reviews.author: C Hunter

customer_reviews.title: Happy, Happy, Happy
customer_reviews.text: I purchased 2 of these recliner protectors for my both sides of my reclining love seat halves and just tucked under the seat the arm rest cover not needed due to the console between the 2 seats and it works out very well. They’re very soft and look awesome and they pretty much stay in place cuz of the elastic belt I wrapped around the head area (just a small adjustment since the chair gets a lot of up and downreclining throughout the day). Very happy with this purchase and reasonably priced too!
customer_reviews.author: Patricia L. Cavanaugh

customer_reviews.title: Best Fit - Doesn't look like the usual cover-up product.
customer_reviews.text: Right out of the package this throw was easy to place on the chair and easy to secure with the elastic belt included. The color is true to photo in the ad and I love that it's reversible. This product description was accurate and truthful. I really liked all the reviews I read and I can only say, all the claims about this product are completely true. I purchased two of these throws, his and hers. They fit beautifully.
customer_reviews.author: Marn

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: I have large dogs that shed, and dont care to wipe their feet. This cover works great for keeping my new couches looking new. Easily washed in the washer, and hung to dry. The flap that drapes over the back is long enough to reach halfway down the back of the chair, so it holds up well to constant movement. The flap that goes over the foot rest is a little short, so my feet rub on the actual couch fabric when reclined.
customer_reviews.author: Brittney

customer_reviews.title: Ok except strap broke within two weeks
customer_reviews.text: The cover is just what we needed, but it takes away from the purpose that the strap to keep it in place broke within the first two weeks. We keep using it because it's needed to cover a worn seat, and the color and size are perfect. The fact that it's washable is also great. But it has to be "made up" repeatedly or it looks awful in the room. The bottom has to be made up a bit anyway, but the back falling down makes it worse. We've been shopping for a replacement strap but none has been found that will blend in and not be noticeable like the one that broke.
customer_reviews.author: longtimebuyer

customer_reviews.title: Very soft and pretty
customer_reviews.text: seafoam and cream color/ first of all the color is not correct on the amazon site, it is much lighter and soft in color, perfect for a seafoam color. Add a mint cast to it, was so happy when I opened the box. You will have to do adjusting as you sit in it and move around but this is to be expected, right! I don’t mind, I want the chairs to not be worn. I ordered a scoundrel pair and will treat them like a bath towel, 1 x a week washing.
customer_reviews.author: L. Paden

customer_reviews.title: Just Okay
customer_reviews.text: This is very thin and the "quilting" is heat stamped, not sewn. There is no rubber backing so it slips as soon as you touch it. It has to be resettled on the chair every time you sit down. The fabric is soft cotton and very comfortable and overall, I don't hate it. It's a cheaply made version of a chair cover, but ultimately, the chair IS covered and it's not ugly. As I said, it's just okay.
customer_reviews.author: LadyC

customer_reviews.title: In a pinch
customer_reviews.text: Came in a confusing package. NO WHERE on it, did it say the size. The picture was of the “couch” cover. I ordered the recliner cover. Emailed for information, no reply. After a week, I opened it, prepared to resold and send it back. It was a recliner cover. I didn’t expect much for the price and wasn’t disappointed. Two stars, because it covers well. It looks cheap, but it was, and I will be covering it with a throw.
customer_reviews.author: mjcl

customer_reviews.title: Could be dangerous to use.
customer_reviews.text: This thing slips around too much even with the straps, the straps even slip on the metal part and start to come loose. The strap even slip completely off once, I would've ate the metal part with my face if I was sitting on it, had to use duct tape to secure the straps. You need to give the metal part some "teeth" for the straps to be more secure.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sofa Shield
customer_reviews.text: Edit: The older recliner was not comfortable, so we purchased a different one. The Sofa Shield works just as well on the leather as it did on cloth. The large size is perfect for a full size recliner. We bought an older recliner. The Sofa Shield fits beautifully, and the quality of the material is nice. I’ll be reupholstering the chair, but will probably continue to keep it covered.
customer_reviews.author: Maddie’sMom

customer_reviews.title: No straps but covers don't
customer_reviews.text: Oversized as stated and definitely covers the recliner but it was said to have straps to hold it in place but none were provided, only cloth tabs where they were supposed to been. Luckily since it is oversized, it doesn't move much. Yes it is thinner than most covers but since your covering your soft furniture with it, doesn't take away the comfort. Have 3 cats that love my soft brush leather furniture , the covers are for them and they like it.
customer_reviews.author: J. Osullivan

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I love this , big enough to cover my recliner, didn’t need the strap ,I just tucked it in.Like the soft cotton feel, easier to move on it. I would say it is more water repellent than water proof. I eat in my chair stains will occur I’m sure but they should come out in the wash.Im glad I ordered it.
customer_reviews.author: Scoots

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful chair covers!
customer_reviews.text: These covers looks wonderful on my new recliners and while the size isn’t perfect for these particular recliners, the fit is sufficient to cover the fabric and the back of the recliner that my cats tend to scratch. These covers are easy to clean, the fabric is soft and the color is just as it was pictured.
customer_reviews.author: Pat K

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.text: Saw these covers at a friend’s beach house. These covers are not waterproof but that’s indicated in the description. I ordered the sea foam/cream and it matches my chair perfectly. The manufacturer advises against use on leather but in fact I bought this cover for a soft vinyl club chair in my sunroom that my cats were leaving claw punctures in. Now they can sleep on the chair to their hearts’ content and it’s protected from little claw holes. Color matches beautifully and the stretch strap is color coordinated.
customer_reviews.author: Gabriele

customer_reviews.title: Oversized.
customer_reviews.text: Works for a large "Dad" recliner. I have it on a mid-size one and it runs a little big. Good protection - put it on a chair for a post-surgical patient to protect the upholstery in case there was a bandage mishap, and it worked like a charm. I'd say it would be great for animals too.
customer_reviews.author: Emjay

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly surprised!
customer_reviews.text: I qas pleasantly surprised! For the money I paid I didn't expect them to be that good looking. I tucked in one side to fit our RV recliners and it's just perfect! I love the colors, too. Hopefully they will keep me as happy as I am now. I just wish they had an adjustable strap at the bottom as well, I added my own but it's not color coordinated, although we can't see them so it's not a big deal.
customer_reviews.author: Gabstronaut

customer_reviews.title: thinner and lighter then I was expecting
customer_reviews.text: It is alot thinner and lighter then I was expecting. It basing around is also a bit cheap looking. It is ok but I would not have bought this if I have seen what it really is like. It is obviously cheaply made from cheap material and will most likely be tossed out after a year or so (I don't think is will survive wear and tear longer then that.)
customer_reviews.author: Ieshadover

customer_reviews.title: Nice fit
customer_reviews.text: It does need to be constantly adjust even when using the strap. I no longer use the strap, I bought two squeeze clamps and they are clamped on the over hanging material on the back of the chair as sort of a counter weight. You still have to adjust the cover but it's so much easier than fighting the strap that constantly come unhooked.
customer_reviews.author: Chris H

customer_reviews.title: We looovveee this one!
customer_reviews.text: My husband looooveeesss this cover, good quality, comfortable and easy to put it over the recliner with the belt to hold it in the back. I will buy a full set to have all the furniture with the same cover and colors. I will recommend anyone looking for covers to check and buy this brand 100%
customer_reviews.author: Carmen Miranda

customer_reviews.title: Attractive and practical protector
customer_reviews.text: I am using this as a protective cover on my recliner. It fits perfectly and stays in place just fine. It is very comfortable to sit on. Also, I don’t have to worry about losing items down into the chair since the protector prevents that from happening. I am very pleased with this recliner protector!
customer_reviews.author: Kenasam

customer_reviews.title: I would buy this product again.
customer_reviews.text: These covers are well made with heavy material and wash beautifully. They are long enough to cover a very large recliner. The only thing I would have liked would be if the top back flap was long enough to tuck into the belt that holds the flap in place. I love them.The price was very good. I had bought others on line and it was a waste of my money.
customer_reviews.author: Rae C.

customer_reviews.title: Great cover for everyday use
customer_reviews.text: This is a great furniture cover if you are looking for something soft and comfortable. I bought this for a double recliner and it fit good, just had to fold one side of the arm rests and tuck it, no issue. I bought it thinking it was waterproof or at least resistant, it was not unfortunately. I tested some water on it and it went right through to my recliner. Other than that it's a great find for a great price!
customer_reviews.author: AZ Gryphon

customer_reviews.title: Solves my problems  LOVE IT!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product!! It really has made my life easier. I don't have to keep pulling back up all day because of these hooks that hold them on. I've only had them for about a month but my dog's gets on them all the time and I take them off an wash them once a week. So far they have held up very nicely. I purchased two different ones so that I can have put on while the other one is in the wash.
customer_reviews.author: LISA MAYER

customer_reviews.title: Soft, Well Fitting Recliner Cover
customer_reviews.text: This recliner cover is exactly as advertised. It fits our power recliner very well. It is soft, machine washable and also reversible. We have the black/grey color. The price is right and it has a lifetime warranty-what more can you ask?
customer_reviews.author: nerak1051

customer_reviews.title: generous size, good quality fabric.
customer_reviews.text: We have medium recliners and these work excellent. They are a generous size and do a good job of covering the chair. Easy to put on and take off. My wife has washed them and they washed up very good. The fabric is pretty good quality and seems to be wearing good after several months of daily use. would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: D. R.

customer_reviews.title: large enough to cover a big recliner
customer_reviews.text: The top of the cover goes over the head of chair and hangs down the back. To prevent the cover from slipping down into the chair when you sit, I attached elastic straps to each side and safety pinned the two ends securely to that back portion of the cover. Cover stays smooth and intact and looks nice.
customer_reviews.author: Roxanne

customer_reviews.title: Excellent investment
customer_reviews.text: I love this!! I bought it for the nursery chair. It’s nice and soft and not noisy (no crunchy sounding waterproof material). The chair I put it on is a huge wingback and it covers everywhere it’s supposed to with plenty of material left to hang in the back. I did not use the straps that came with because it stays put with middle of the night feedings.
customer_reviews.author: KyleAnne

customer_reviews.title: Great chair cover!
customer_reviews.text: We love this chair cover. We recently bought a rocker recliner, and wanted it to last, so we bought the cover to protect it. Love the color, and it's so silky soft. Putting it on is super easy. It's machine washable, but we haven't had any spills yet. We decided not to use the stay strap for now, but are glad it came with it. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Andrea49

customer_reviews.title: Poor fit
customer_reviews.text: We have a leather like recliner and wanted this to fit properly and keep away from the colder material. The elastic strap fastener came off of bunched into a corner making them look untidy. Material was stitched well but once you place it on the chair sit them get up or recline the cover bundles up or simply comes off.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Banikas

customer_reviews.title: Not exactly what I expected
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the cover for my recliner and I have mixed feelings about it. I ordered the seafoam because the color was perfect for my livingroom, but it was much lighter and I'm not happy with that. But, I kept it anyway. It is soft, but it moves around and I always have to straighten it every time you get out of the recliner. I should have returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Jules

customer_reviews.title: Nice enough to keep on
customer_reviews.text: Have had these for months and washed many times. Originally thought we’d remove them from our new recliners when we were sitting in them, but they are soft enough to sit on as well. We’ve washed them several times and they hold up well. Now we only remove them when we have company.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen A. Phillips

customer_reviews.title: Pretty
customer_reviews.text: The clean bit sections I left blank since I don't know. It hasn't gotten dirty yet. So far though it is wonderful. Due to the type of recliner I have, this cover is HUGE but it still works for what I need. It offers protection and comfort, even for the cat that lays on it all the time. :D
customer_reviews.author: Skeletta

customer_reviews.title: It fits the chair perfectly.
customer_reviews.text: It dits the chair perfectly. We have a new puppy who insists to climb on it when even my husband gets out of the chair. It will save our chair. Thank you for making a cover for small recliners.
customer_reviews.author: D.Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Solid product
customer_reviews.text: Excellent value for the most part. Fits over my recliner very well and most importantly, is made of a fabric/padding that doesn't get overly hot when you sit on it. The major downside is the strap that secures the cover to the chair. It's an absolute nightmare. It won't stay connected to the fabric and has gone flying off. I sewed it to the cover, but it now pulls. It seems like it would be better to have it sewn directly.
customer_reviews.author: Coffee, Stat!

customer_reviews.title: Nice and soft
customer_reviews.text: Very nice cover, thick enough and very soft. I have another in a grey color and it looks like new every time i wash it. very easy to maintain and keep clean. i just bought a green/sage one and it is just as nice. I highly recommend this chair cover.
customer_reviews.author: cindysue

customer_reviews.title: order  correct  one
customer_reviews.text: i am so happy with this cover ... its the 3rd one i've tried guess 3rd times a charm !! first two were big enough to fit a love seat .... this site offered a large and small recliner size .. other sites i would order the "recliner " and didn't work so ordered the "small" recliner size and it fits awesome... the only negative thing is the arm covers are longer the wanted and alittle wide but i can live with both rest of cover is sooo nice and feels nice to sit on .. i recommend for smaller recliners
customer_reviews.author: sundancerr

customer_reviews.title: Easy care and great furniture protection
customer_reviews.text: This product has saved my furniture. My 20 month old English Bulldog still has his dew claws and the we’re catching the fabric on sofa and recliner. I have had them repaired. But this product holds up well against his nails and washes up great.
customer_reviews.author: lindase

customer_reviews.title: Great Cover So Far
customer_reviews.text: Love this comfy and generously sized recliner cover. I haven’t washed it yet so I can’t comment on that. Seriously considering ordering couch and loveseat sizes too. I have tried so many chair covers and either the cats snagged them by accident or they were too skimpy in size to cover the much hated microfiber fabric my expensive lazy boy recliner is covered in.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Al-Aghbary

customer_reviews.title: Great recliner protector
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this purchase. They stay tucked in quite well. Very generously sized. Order the size of your chair measurements, don't assume the larger size will fit better unless your chair is has the larger measurements. They wash and dry perfectly. I can't rate the water resistance feature as my dog doesn't have accidents. Will highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Bree's Mom

customer_reviews.title: Gave them a 3 - should’ve been a 5
customer_reviews.text: Product is great - just didn’t work with our recliners so I returned them without issue - great experience...just didn’t work for our furniture. Wish I had rated them higher than a 3, as the actual product and service were great
customer_reviews.author: C. Rich

customer_reviews.title: Cut Full
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent recliner cover. We have an oversized recliner and sometimes the covers are not large enough. This one fits well. The quality of the material and stitching seems really good. We just put it on today so no idea how it washes and dries but the fabric feels fine. Very pleased. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Judy Smith

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Not super cheap but nothing bad to say. It came as described. We like the color too. We bought red and pink. We returned the red because it came out maroon. Then we purchased all our covers pink. Was the least "old-looking" color. It was soft. Mom sleeps on it every night. Helps protects her recliner chair.
customer_reviews.author: Pablo Alvarado

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I am very impressed with this product. I read all the reviews on recliner covers and thought I would give this one a try. I'm glad I did. It was very easy to put on my 2 recliners and fit pretty good. It was a little larger in size but has the feature of tucking in it. The length was long enough to cover the foot rest. It looks very nice! I would recommend this cover for your recliner. Make sure you measure the length and width to get a good fit!
customer_reviews.author: Sharon M Sloan

customer_reviews.title: good looks and high quality
customer_reviews.text: Just wanted something to cover new recliner chairs to protect from our dogs. Got a pretty and soft to the touch quilted cover that stays in place, looks nice, fits and protects. Happily surprised how nice they look. Still will remove when guests comes over...but for our everyday use...they look nice!
customer_reviews.author: L. Wilke

customer_reviews.title: very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I actually bought a large size for my recliner, but I have a faux medium size swivel rocker that is tearing in a couple of spots so decided to try this cover on it instead. It's working out just fine, looks great and is very comfortable. I suppose it is a little over sized for this chair, but I like it like that, it actually fits just right. Picture doesn't do it justice, because I have the chair at an angle, cover looks better in person. I'm going to buy another for my regular recliner.
customer_reviews.author: Carlie

customer_reviews.title: Looks Messy
customer_reviews.text: The hook and elastic that wrap around the back do not hold the recliner cover in place, or keep it from moving every time you sit on it. It wrinkles, twists, the metal hooks turn sideways so the elastic doesn't hold the cover in place. It looks like an unmade bed, which is not a good look for the living room.
customer_reviews.author: R. A. Jewell

customer_reviews.title: Great price!
customer_reviews.text: It slides down the back of the couch a bit, even with the straps attached....but we have 2 dogs and 2 boys that are involved in the results.... UPDATE - a hole appeared in the seam after a month of use, could not find contact info to report to company but did contact Amazon customer service who quickly refunded my $ once the damaged item was returned - also encouraged me to re-order replacement
customer_reviews.author: BF828

customer_reviews.title: Recliner Covers
customer_reviews.text: We’re not sure how these covers are going to work. They look great, but I think there is too much movement. Our daughter and her family are taking our 5th wheel to the beach for a long weekend. She’ll be able to tell us if they moved too much. Our grands are 13, 10, & 6. Plus, there is another family along also in their 5th wheel. This weekend should score the covers well!
customer_reviews.author: Janice Phelps

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: I bought the small size recliner cover for my husband's Lazy Boy motorized lift recliner. The burgundy color matches the chair, and it fits easily. I haven't washed it yet, but it appears well made and is a fabric that should wash well.
customer_reviews.author: Mel Stein

customer_reviews.title: Fits like a dream
customer_reviews.text: I just received these covers so I cant really rate the stain resistant and easy to clean with 5 stars yet. I did know that they were not water repellent before I bought them. I read the reviews on these covers and was warned about getting the measurements right. When I put these covers on my chairs, they fit like a dream. They are long enough going over the back of the chair and also the arms that they don't slip off. They look really nice and I am extremely happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Back seat rider

customer_reviews.title: Protects recliner well.
customer_reviews.text: The sofa shield covers the recliner well. It is a little bigger than I thought, but does fine. Wish there were more patterns to choose from, but colors are as described. Have not had it long enough to know how water resistant or easy to clean it is. The cat loves it too. :)
customer_reviews.author: Photo gal

customer_reviews.title: Nice fit
customer_reviews.text: I received my 2 chair coverings and they were better than expected. They are a bit larger than I thought they would be which is great. The elastic strap that you apply on the back of the chair is much nicer and sturdier than I thought it would be. I bought the dark grey and they look nice and are very comfortable to sit in. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good product.
customer_reviews.text: Used these on my recliner loveseat. Works fine, not so much with grandkids who use it as a blanket. Always having to fix them, my fault though, I have a leather loveseat and ordered the wrong one. Otherwise, it fits perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Melodi

customer_reviews.title: That red is not the red it is
customer_reviews.text: Considering that most of the photos are of the "burgundy" color, you'd think in real life it would be pretty close. It's not, it's an unpleasant, pinkish red. Although the overall quality appears to be quite good, we're sending it back, as we can't live with that color.
customer_reviews.author: P. Mcclure

customer_reviews.title: This is a good protector for chair or loveseat.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a loveseat primarily for warmer weather. Its a generic fit, meaning its loose fitting and likely not going to completely contour to you piece of furniture as shown in the display photograph. That being said, it works and is easy to take on and off and is washable.
customer_reviews.author: mkpi

customer_reviews.title: Husband loves it!  Exactly what he was seeking.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the small recliner cover. I just received it this week but thus far, I am very happy with the cover. It is well made, washable and looks very nice.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda W. Flood

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Fit
customer_reviews.text: With 4 small dogs, I have been looking for a non slip covering for my oversized recliner. I already have one for my couch and love seat, but was having a hard time finding one for my recliner. This is perfect - fits great, doesn't slip, soft and the reversible colors are an added touch. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A Pet Cover That Works
customer_reviews.text: You ever buy a cover for your furniture to keep your adorable dog from making a mess and then discover it just doesn't work right? Well that does not apply to this. It overlaps the arm rests and the strap keep the back from flipping over. Mud and stains are easy to wipe off and I do't believe it will be a problem washing it.
customer_reviews.author: Paul L.

customer_reviews.title: Stay put and comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased 2 of these covers for our Lazy Boy recliners. I hated that I had to cover them but with 2 cats that still have claws I need to protect the furniture. They are a very nice weight and soft to the touch, not stiff like a lot of other covers I looked at. They stay put and the color is not too far off from the fabric of the chairs themselves. I would recommend these covers.
customer_reviews.author: Cruzsuz

customer_reviews.title: Very useful in a reasonable price.
customer_reviews.text: The color is the same by both parts , soft and very easy to clean. You should be sure to know the size you are looking for before you buy. For mi was perfect. Came on time and very well protected.
customer_reviews.author: Pedro

customer_reviews.title: Good fit, easy to put on furniture, throw into washer when you need to clean them
customer_reviews.text: We've got them for our couch and rocker chairs at home because we have a very active mid sized pooch who lays on them throughout the day. We also bought a pair for our 5th Wheel trailer and put them on our rockers in there also.
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: A must for pet owners
customer_reviews.text: I have several of these. Between the big dog and teenage boys I need to buy more. They are easy to wash and will protect your furniture. If you buy 1 I suggest you buy 2, so while on is being washed the other can cover the furniture. My only complaint is that I wish they were more durable.
customer_reviews.author: Trakwrkr

customer_reviews.title: Covers up stains, beautiful color
customer_reviews.text: We’ve only had it a few days but I’m so glad to cover up our old stained chair! It’s a nice gray color - goes well with any decor. I doubt we’ll use the tan side but I like that it’s reversible. Note to company: the packaging is confusing and I almost returned it before opening because it came in a “sofa” package, with a picture of a larger couch on the front. Maybe just a mistake but wanted them to know.
customer_reviews.author: Elyse Rowland

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase / Highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: Update: We have owned these for nearly a year and wash them 2 to 3 times a month. They hold up very well and continue to protect the furniture. Worth every penny and would definitely purchase them again.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Nice Value
customer_reviews.text: I was looking at throwing out my vinyl chair, but this cover gives it a new life so Ill probably keep it another year. Great value. It's large, soft, and looks well made. I wish the bottom was the same color though, because it really stands out.
customer_reviews.author: T

customer_reviews.title: Love them.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two small recliner covers for my dual recliner in the 5th wheel. They are cute, soft, and comfortable to sit on. They were also very easy to install on the chairs. Pet hair is easy to remove also, which is a huge plus for us. I will be purchasing more for the other chairs in the 5th wheel.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Elstoen

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again!
customer_reviews.text: Fits wonderfully on our large recliner! Make sure you measure! I considered getting a Large because our chair is soo big, but the small fits it so nicely. It covers the areas you sit and touch and that’s what I was looking for. Not necessarily something that covered the seat entirely. It’s easy to put on, and there’s enough fabric you can tuck into the seams to give it a clean look.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Little

customer_reviews.title: It’s ok if you don’t sit in the chair and if you like thin material
customer_reviews.text: I have a normal size leather recliner and bought this product to protect it. The strap fits nicely around it but as soon as u sit in chair the whole thing becomes a mess . I was also disappointed in how thin this protector is ... this amazon purchase was not a win ...with all my purchases on amazon this was the most disappointing of them all
customer_reviews.author: Claudine h.

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: it came very quick ordered one day received the next cant get any better than that it is a great cover fits my recliner perfect just what I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: sharon

customer_reviews.title: Sofa Shield Original Patent Pending Reversible Small Recliner Protector, Seat Width to 25 Inch,
customer_reviews.text: Good product. I use sewing screws to hold in place but you don't have to. Stays clean, in place, worth every bit the price you pay. I ordered a dark grey. Would encourage people to buy it.
customer_reviews.author: Karen M Le Seure

customer_reviews.title: Good cover
customer_reviews.text: Soft to the touch, good coverage for the chair, matches well, time will tell if it protects the furniture from spills and accidents, but so far so good.
customer_reviews.author: Hotbod Handsomeface

customer_reviews.title: Fit nice and great price!
customer_reviews.text: Just got this in and so farit's great. I have new furniture and a Siberian husky that thinks this chair is hers, so a cover was a must! This one looks and fits nicely and very soft.
customer_reviews.author: sapphire27

customer_reviews.title: furniture covers
customer_reviews.text: The product (s) are exactly what I wanted. They go on my outdoor patiio furnitureand looke great. My patio is enclosed but sometimes wind and rain blow in through the screening. These are perfect to protect that furniture's cushtions and they look great as well.
customer_reviews.author: M. Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Going to order one for my couch love it
customer_reviews.text: I love this cover. I have 5 dogs and some cats. Easy care and durable. Have not had issues with it sliding around. I do not have leather. Going to order one for the couch. Great colors
customer_reviews.author: Sam Reese

customer_reviews.title: Excellent coverage.
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful color, great coverage for my small wing back recliner. Really like the extra wide arm covers. Only had it for a week but it seems to stay in place well. Haven’t had to re tuck. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer/reader

product_meta.title: Sofa Shield Original Patent Pending Reversible Large Recliner Protector, Seat Width to 28 Inch, Furniture Slipcover, 2 Inch Strap, Reclining Chair Slip Cover Throw for Dogs, Recliner, Chocolate Beige
feature_bullets: THE MOST COLORS AND PATTERNS: We offer more colors and patterns to better fit your individual style! Choose from dozens of Sofa Shield designs that will help make your home beautiful, all while protecting your furniture. Plus, Sofa Shield offers you more sizes! Choose from our line to fit your sofa, loveseat, futon, recliner, chair, chaise and sectional. Finally, a furniture protector that offers you and your home a stylish upgrade.

PERFECT FIT: We offer our recliner sized covers in two sizes for the perfect fit. Choose from the SMALL (25" seat width) or the LARGE (28" seat width). See our Measuring Guide in the photos for a list of all measurements.

/!\ WARNING: Strap should not be stretched to exceed seat width +10” (Large Sofa, Futon, Small Sofa, Loveseat, 48” Chair, 23” Chair, Small Recliner, Chaise Lounge, Sectional Corner) or +16” (Extra Large Oversized Sofa, Large Recliner). Over-stretching strap can result in strap breaking and snapping back at you!

A BETTER FURNITURE PROTECTOR: The Original Sofa Shield protectors feature the most generous size to cover more of your furniture, have a much higher thread count for an extra soft feel, and are the thickest and plushest for the most comfort. They’re also tested to be 100% machine washable and dryable. Plus, they come with an exclusively designed, patent-pending 2” thick and adjustable strap (to help hold your cover in place) engineered to be strong and effective for your Sofa Shield cover.

LIFETIME WARRANTY: We stand behind our product. All of our furniture protectors come with a LIFETIME NO QUESTIONS ASKED WARRANTY. If you are at all unsatisfied with your product for any reason (even if it’s the dog's fault), please contact us (through Amazon if past the standard return window) and we will be happy to assist you. Our goal is for you to be happy!

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars3,052 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
